item.title: Autocad-2: Rotating and scaling a scanned layout plan with a reference line; using a carpark lot.
item.author: michtintin
item.description: Align & Scale Shortcut using coordinates for accuracy. 00:00-00:17 Introduction Hi Everyone! Today I will be showing you how to scale a drawing with a carpark lot on the plan. A carpark lot is 2.4 meters by 5.8 meters, so if you have a scanned plan which is out of scale, you can use this method to scale it. 00:18-1:20 Draw one side of a carpark lot to scale of 1:1.
